pages.text: Exploring this world will take you to increasingly powerful places, and you'll need to constantly improve yourself to keep up with them. $(br2)As a result, some items can only be obtained after the player reaches a certain phase, otherwise the player will not be able to pick them up. $(br2)Before that, players can make an Unknown Bag to put items in, and take them out later when the corresponding phase is unlocked.

Once the player has made the corresponding Energy Condenser, they can unlock the corresponding phase. $(br2)It's worth noting that as the player's abilities become stronger, the monsters around them will also become stronger. $(br2)At the same time, the disturbance to the EMCWorld will be greater, and more EMC will be consumed after each action. $(br2)Some items cannot be condensed by EMC and must be obtained when the player has reached a sufficient phase. Otherwise, the items can only be converted into EMC.
Another thing to note is that in modpack 3.0 difficulty (default), monster damage is reduced by 33.3%, while player damage is increased by 16.7%.
